alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, southern Cleburne, northeastern Faulkner and west central White Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1118 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guy, or 17 miles southeast of Clinton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Quitman... Guy... Rose Bud... Fairbanks... Gravel Hill... Wilburn... Morganton... Sidon... Enders... Hopewell in Cleburne County... Pearson... Joy... Eden Isle... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County; White
